column2: Edwards Lifesciences Corp. engages in the patient-focused medical innovations for heart disease and critical care monitoring. The company is headquartered in Irvine, California and currently employs 12,800 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in patient-focused innovations for structural heart disease and critical care monitoring. Its segments include United States, Europe, Japan and Rest of World. Its products are categorized into three areas: Transcatheter Heart Valve Therapy, Surgical Heart Valve Therapy and Critical Care. The company also develops hemodynamic monitoring systems that are used to measure a patient's cardiovascular function in the hospital setting. The company is developing products, such as the Edwards SAPIEN 3 Ultra System and Edwards SAPIEN XT transcatheter heart valve, among others. Its Transcatheter Heart Valve Therapy and Surgical Heart Valve Therapy products are manufactured in the United States, Singapore and Switzerland. Critical Care products are manufactured in its facilities located in Puerto Rico and the Dominican Republic.
